rules.natural: Either the router is online for the home network, or the mesh node is online in the living room.
Whenever the mesh node is online in the living room, then should the living room be connected to Wi-Fi, it follows that the lights are functional in the living room.

If internet service is available from the provider, then given that the router is online for the home network, the implication that the living room being connected to Wi-Fi leads to the lights being functional in the living room holds.
Either internet service is available from the provider, or cellular backup is active for the home system.

In the event that cellular backup is active for the home system, then whenever the router is online for the home network, the condition that the living room is connected to Wi-Fi ensures that the lights are functional in the living room.
Should the battery system be solar charged, then if battery power is active for the home system, backup power becomes active for the home system.
Either the battery system is solar charged, or it is grid charged.
In cases where the battery system is generator charged, then if battery power is active for the home system, backup power will be active for the home system.
If maintenance has been performed on the battery system, then whenever the battery system is grid charged, it follows that it is generator charged.
Whenever there is a power outage in the neighborhood, battery power is active for the home system.
If a power outage happens in the neighborhood, the smart bulb is operational in the living room.
Either there is a power outage in the neighborhood, or the city is experiencing a grid failure.
Whenever the city is experiencing a grid failure, then if the city's grid power is not stable, it results in the home system being offline.
If backup power is active for the home system, then in the situation that the city's grid power is not stable, the home system becomes offline.
Should the generator be running for the home system, then backup power is active for the home system.
Provided the lights are functional in the living room, backup power is active for the home system.
Whenever the smart bulb is operational in the living room, the living room is connected to Wi-Fi.
If it is not the case that a power outage in the neighborhood implies the generator is running for the home system, then manual override is active for the home system.
In the event that maintenance has not been performed on the battery system, the battery system is degraded.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the home system is offline.
The battery system is not degraded.
It is not the case that manual override is active for the home system.

target.natural: The city's grid power is stable.
